content.content: Highlights of the month      EthCC and daivinity   Many members of the Growth core unit attended the ETHCC. Nadia led the talk, “Growing as a DAO - MakerDAO Lessons Learned” at the conference. We also arranged a partners dinner where we discussed our current partnerships and plans with people from Binance, Nexo, Crypto.com, Gnosis, SocGen, and Centrifuge, among others.   Collaboration with BanklessDAO   We have once again partnered with the amazing BanklessDAO  to educate the DeFi community on our Multichain Strategy 1 and what it means for their DAI. This was an in-depth technical piece explaining the difference between Canonical and Wrapped DAI, and was also featured in the Bankless Weekly Newsletter. Click here for the article.   Integration of Dai on hashport  With this integration, Dai becomes one of the first stablecoins on hashport. Dai also becomes the first multi-collateralized stablecoin available on Hedera. Hedera is the most used enterprise-grade public network and its DeFi ecosystem keeps growing. That’s why Dai is a fundamental piece of Hedera. You can refer to the blog post and tweet announcement by hashport or our tweet thread for more information.    Fiscal Year Budget Closure  Starting last year, we switched from posting our PnL in the forum to sharing it with @strat-fin-core-unit  and having a public spreadsheet with all the information. With our FY22 budget approved, we have closed FY21 and returned* the unused funds to the protocol. Here is a summary of the FY22 Budget closure:  Monthly costs breakdown  image1384×690 87.5 KB   Summary FY21 Current number of FTE: 9.25 Approved DAI budget:                   3.524.785,00 DAI Actual until the end of June:         2.936.581,66 DAI Buffer (approved on latest MIP):     350.000,00 DAI Total Actual:                                     3.286.581,66 DAI To return:                                            238.203,34 DAI Approved max MKR year 1:                    803,18 MKR MKR year 1 according to current FTE:   740,00 MKR To return:                                                     63,18 MKR *Based on our conversation with @prose11, we decided to vest from the Growth Stream just the needed amount and left there the unused funds. That means we won’t use anymore the MKR stream #2 and the DAI stream #14.  General updates   Business development We closed four integrations in July. Please see below for details of the integrations:   Popcorn Network launched liquidity mining with a philanthropy yield offering. Dai is included in Popcorn’s yield optimization strategy that offers exposure to USD and Euro stablecoins. - Link  Completed integration with gTrade. Trades on gTrade are opened with DAI collaterals, which get deposited into the DAI vault, regardless of the trading pair. The leverage is synthetic; backed by the vault, the GNS/DAI liquidity, and the GNS token. DAI is taken from the vault pays the traders back +/- PNL when a trade is closed. Current DAI vault TVL: 10M; APY is 22%. - Link   Arrakis Finance listed DAI / USDC pair on Polygon Completed Integration of Dai on hashport - Link   BlockFi added MKR for the buy/sell and earn yield program in July. - Link   For more detailed business development updates, refer to the recent forum posts covering the North America and Europe regions.  Marketing and communication  Top 5 tweets of the month    Maker Governance votes to add a 100 million DAI debt ceiling participation facility proposed by the Huntingdon Valley Bank, as a new collateral type in the Maker Protocol Maker Governance has voted to allocate 500 million DAI with an investment strategy composed of US Short Treasuries (80%) + IG Corp Bond (20%) Twitter poll on real-world assets connected to DeFi MakerDAO now on Lens Protocol Tweet thread explaining the current status of the real-world asset collateral development in Maker   Monthly Twitter report Followers: 226.7k (+1.4% MoM) Impressions in July: 1,600.9k (+9.2% MoM) Engagement in July: 38.5k (+4.4% MoM)   Recently published articles and PR releases  Societe Generale - Forge Vault PR  - Link  Collaborated with BanklessDAO to publish an article providing an in-depth technical piece explaining the difference between Canonical and Wrapped DAI - Link  15+ articles covering $100 million Dai vault with Huntingdon Valley Bank - Link    Marketing activations and speaker sessions  Announced Dai Integration with hashport and announced on their blog along with a tweet thread.  Scheduled upcoming report on Maker governance and delegation with Anchorage Digital. Continued marketing of the Nature POAP initiative - Link.  We have planted 122 trees so far    Please refer to the most recent forum post by the Brand team for a more detailed marketing and communication update.  We want to hear from you    Please share your thoughts, feedback, or tips in the comments below. Please use this link if you prefer to engage with us anonymously.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Highlights of the month      Transparency Dashboard  Although the Forum is the place where the Maker Community can find information about CUs, with all the flow of information, sometimes it’s hard to find all you want to know about the Growth CU. As a response to that, and as a preparation for the SES transparency tool, we created a public Notion where you will find all about our CU:  Finance Dashboard: Budget and expenses Business Development Dashboard: closed integrations Twitter Dashboard: Impression, followers, and engagement Marketing and PR Dashboard: Campaigns and press releases Brand analysts Key highlights Link to our updates in the forum Let us know your thoughts @Recognized-Delegates     Argent  We launched an educational campaign with Argent where we reached out to the 500k Argent users and signups with email series to explain DAI, stablecoins, MakerDAO and how DAI is decentralized. Thanks to this campaign we could increase DAI daily deposits on L2s and first-time DAI deposits.   HVB  To announce to the world one of the most important integrations of the year with Huntingdon Valley Bank, the Brand team worked on a video explaining how Maker, through RWA is connecting TradFi and DeFi. Click here for the video.   Maker Delegation with Anchorage  Through Anchorage, users can participate in Maker Governance in two ways:  Direct voting in Governance Polls and Executive Votes with MKR tokens held in Anchorage custody. Delegating voting power to another address through the MakerDAO Delegation model.  Click here to learn more.   LinkedIn and Website MIP60  We made a formal request to receive the management of the LinkedIn account and the MakerDAO website. We believe it’s important to ensure these two platforms reflect and support the current state of the protocol. Click here for the LinkedIn request, and here for the Website request.   EthWarsaw  Members of the Growth core unit attended the ETHWarsaw. Nadia participated in a panel with meaningful insights in the panel DAO & Governance, Rajiv shared his thoughts on the future of real-world assets. For the first time, we had the opportunity to have a booth at the conference. It was a great opportunity to explain to newcomers all about Maker and have a meeting point for all the Maker fam. Click here for a summary of the conference.    General updates   Business development We closed 4 integrations in August. Please see below for details of the integrations:  SGForge: OFH Token vault has been deployed. Arrakis: Listed DAI / USDC pair on Polygon. Gtrade/Gains network: Trades are opened with DAI collaterals, which gets deposited into the DAI vault, regardless of the trading pair. The leverage is synthetic; backed by the vault, the GNS/DAI liquidity, and the GNS token. DAI is taken from the vault pay the traders back +/- PNL when a trade is closed. Rain Exchange: Listed the MKR token.  For more detailed business development updates, refer to the recent forum posts covering the North America, Europe and APAC regions.  Marketing and communication  Top 5 tweets of the month    RWA Collaterals Status Explanation. Thread HVB Announcement Arbitrum Nova Dai Bridge Potential merge risks for Maker Maker Multichain Strategy   Recently published articles and PR releases  Societe Generale - Forge Vault PR  - Link  Report on MKR delegation   Marketing activations and speaker sessions  Argent campaign, reaching out more than 500k Argent users Continued marketing of the Nature POAP initiative - Link.  We have planted 125 trees so far    Please refer to the most recent forum post by the Brand team for a more detailed marketing and communication update.  We want to hear from you    Share your thoughts, feedback or tips with us in the comments below. Please use this link if you prefer engaging with us anonymously.

Great recap and super nice to have your dashboard, pretty usefull for members and stakeholders. Have Growth CU consider to become / be part of a MetaDAO in the future? If no, how partnerships and operations will continue? Thanks!

discourse_list.title: Growth CU Monthly Update, October + November 2022

content.content: Highlights of the month     Optimism Proposal  _   With the objective of increasing DAI usage in Optimism, we posted “The Interstellar Dai Journey” proposal in the Optimism Forum. With this proposal, we want to incentivize Dai usage on Optimism by rewarding Optimism Dai users who have been legitimately involved in the Optimism ecosystem. Inspired by the mechanism Optimism used with the OP token launch, we planned a schedule to reward users who got to perform certain tasks to receive OP incentives. “The Interstellar Dai Journey” consist of a series of stages that will take Dai holders to the Optimism Universe, rewarding them for their Dai usage. You can find the proposal here.  Maker Teleport Grant   After Maker Teleport’s official announcement, we activated a 10,000 DAI grant for any builder who integrates Maker Teleport with a functional user interface. Do you know someone who might be interested? send them this link with all the details of the grant.  New Collaterals: rETH and GNO   We welcome two new collaterals in Maker. Although their liquidity and therefore their DC is less than what we usually demand, these two collaterals are highly important for Maker:  rETH: by onboarding it, Maker is proclaming its support for the decentralized success of the Ethereum network. As a step towards that outcome, the diversification of Ethereum node operators is crucial and growing accessibility for staking is needed. GNO: As you might know, Gnosis Chain uses DAI to pay for gas fees, tightening the ties that unite both projects. GnosisDAO is also one of the main vault users using  stETH collateral, and with the onboarding, they committed to maintain no less than 75% of stablecoin borrowing activities with Maker.    Transparency Dashboard  Check our Notion to find all you want to know about the Growth CU.   General updates   Business development We closed 12 integrations in October and November. Please see below for details of the integrations:  Rain MKR Binance Argentina Arbitrum Ecosystem Monetalis MIP65 - Liquid Bond GUSD PSM Trader Joe Award Pool Sygnum Bank RocketPool ETH Collateral Arcade Allbriddge GNO Collateral  For more detailed business development updates, refer to the recent forum posts covering the North America, Europe and APAC regions.  Marketing and communication  Top 5 tweets of the last months     Maker Teleport Announcement tweet + Grant - 72k Impressions  RocketPool rETH Collateral Announcement - 62k Impressions  Teleport to Arbitrum tweet - 45k Impressions  GUSD Executive vote - 35k Impressions  Coinbase Institutional Rewards - 22k Impressions   Recently published articles and PR releases  Coindesk - Coinbase to Significantly Benefit From $1.6B Transfer of MakerDAO’s USDC, Analyst Says  MetaDAOs (4 different coverages), here some coverages:  The Defiant - MakerDAO Poised to Break Up Into ‘MetaDAOs’ in Historic Shakeup  CriptoFacil (Portuguese) - MakerDAO pronto para se dividir em ‘MetaDAOs’ em mudança histórica    Monetalis (over 10 articles worldwide), here one from Bloomberg:  Bloomberg-DeFi Protocol MakerDAO Puts $500 Million in Treasuries, Bonds    Endgame (6 different coverages), here one of them:  Decrypt - MakerDAO Splits in Two Over Founder’s ‘Endgame’ Proposal    AMBCrypto - MakerDAO’s new update may reduce risk for its users  Maker Teleport (4 different coverages), here one of them:  CoinDesk- DeFi Giant MakerDAO Speeds Up DAI Transactions and Withdrawals, Expands to Arbitrum, Osmosis    rETH as Collateral: The Defiant - MakerDAO Brings Aboard Rocket Pool’s LSD Token  Coinshares proposal (6 coverages), here one of them:  CoinDesk-MakerDAO Community Rejects CoinShares Proposal to Invest Up to $500M in Bonds    renBTC, AMB Crypto- MakerDAO: What this “Optimistic” proposal may mean for MKR and DAI  DSR, CoinDesk- DeFi Giant MakerDAO Voting on Hiking DAI Stablecoin Rewards    Marketing activations and speaker sessions   Especial de Binance Card: Pagá con DAI y accedé a recompensas en DAI, a special campaign for latin america, specific for Argentinians who made use of Binance card.  Pyth integration - Pyth partners with Maker to bring DAI to Solana.  Please refer to the most recent forum post by the Brand team for a more detailed marketing and communication update.  We want to hear from you    Share your thoughts, feedback or tips with us in the comments below. Please use this link if you prefer engaging with us anonymously.

MakerGrowth:   Maker Teleport Grant   After Maker Teleport’s official announcement, we activated a 10,000 DAI grant for any builder who integrates Maker Teleport with a functional user interface. Do you know someone who might be interested? send them this link with all the details of the grant.   Saw this on Twitter and was very nice. Waiting for an update on this
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Highlights of the month      MakerDAO celebrates World Environmental Day  We launched Nature, a POAP collection that symbolizes the role of Maker Vaults and Dai within the web3 ecosystem. Nature will be sent to all new and prior Maker Vault owners. There will be 10 planted trees  for each new opened Maker Vault. Click here for more information.   MakerDAO onboards Mastercard  To fill the need for alternative sources of capital and faster approvals, Mastercard and FreshSupplyCo approached Maker to explore options to meet the growing demand. We worked with them and ConsolFreight to use the data of the invoice together with the shipment data and mint DAI from a Maker Vault through Centrifuge to finance the operation. Click here for more information.   Hack Money 2022  We sponsored the Hack Money Hackathon from May 6th to 27th and gave the participants the MakerDAO wishlist, a set of ideas that the DAO wants to be converted into solutions. During the Hackathon, Mori and Luis presented “How MakerDAO keeps building on DAI” to explain to developers how to build on top of Maker and during that month, they helped the groups of devs to build their ideas. The winners for this Hack Money edition are:   Maker Teleport UI – Teleporter by Roshan Palakkal --: The Teleporter is a Maker Teleport UI, allowing the Maker Teleport to be used by anyone with a simple UI and smooth UX, being then the first UI to integrate the Maker Teleport.  MakerDAO Oracle Dashboard – DEFI Spotlight by Ashik Abdul Rahuman Peer Mohamed–: DEFI Spotlight gives data about MakerDAO in a simple Dashboard, being part of this data about the Maker Oracles, what they are and the Oracle Gas Fees.  The MakerDAO wishlist+grants will continue, and we will support the teams that can help us grow the protocol. Click here for more information.    General updates    A week ago, we presented Q1 review during the QSR-Q122 where we discussed the main integrations and activations and the identified opportunities and challenges from our perspective. I invite all of you to go through the presentation, and in case you want more details, you may find it on the Growth’s year in review.   To increase visibility on what we are doing and give a different perspective to the Maker community, we’ve split our monthly updates into three posts: one with general updates that will provide you with an overview of what we did on the month, one with the Brand team updates, and one from one of our BDs to provide you with an overview of a region or specific vertical. Each post will be published per week.    Business development We have closed eight integrations during Q2. Some notable partners are Mastercard+ConsolFreight and Nexo supporting MKR. Here is the list of the marketing assets we created for these partnerships:  Mastercard: MakerDAO thread, PR with the agency (in progress) Nexo: MakerDAO thread, Maker Growth Thread and Twitter Spaces   Additionally, please see below for details of the other integrations: Completed collaboration with Axelar Network to enhance DAI usage and liquidity through cross promotion and other initiatives - Link Mobilum now supports Dai. Mobilum is a fiat on and off ramp with support for 80+ fiat currencies and has 200k+ users. Mobilum provides OTC and exchange services to Crypto.com Velodrome, a new Optimism AMM, supports Dai and has announced that MakerDAO will receive ~1% of initial voting power to steer emissions on its trading and liquidity marketplace. - Link Established new Dai onramp through MoonPay integration. Dai is now listed on their platform. Dai Vault integration on Instadapp’s Lite version has been completed. This allows users to start earning a 5.7% APY on their Dai with one single click! - Link Concluded the integration with Meshswap, making Dai more accessible to the Polygon ecosystem and providing ways for Dai holders to generate high returns on Meshswap - Link   Marketing and communication  Top tweets of the month    https://twitter.com/MakerDAO/status/1531307441023066115 https://twitter.com/MakerDAO/status/1527738347803840513 https://twitter.com/MakerDAO/status/1524756317495250944 https://twitter.com/MakerDAO/status/1524146761752891392 https://twitter.com/MakerDAO/status/1529891415207170048   Monthly Twitter report Followers: 219.7k (+4.5% MoM) Impressions in May: 1458.2k (+12.1% MoM) Engagement in May: 35.2k (+38.2% MoM)   Recently published articles and PR releases  Media coverage of DAI as a stablecoin across main media channels: Coindesk, Blockworks, Benzinga, Business Insider, TIME, Yahoo Finance. Multichain strategy, Starknet integration: we worked with BanklessDAO on the announcement and with our PR agency on a press release distributed in more than 30 media outlets.    Marketing activations and speaker sessions  Meshswap: Completed DAI integration and made the announcement on Twitter Fluidity held a Twitter Space with Jocelyn on May 27th Retweeted DeFi Yield’s interview with @hexonaut   Winners of Hack Money 2022   We want to hear from you    Share your thoughts, feedback or tips with us in the comments below. Please use this link if you prefer engaging with us anonymously.
Nice update! Lot’s of cool stuff in the works. Great to see!
Amazing work/effort @Nadia @MarianoDP and all of the growth and brand team. A roadmap to keep this momentum going throughout the year and beyond is so necessary
First update post and what a surprise, amazing to see how just one Core Unit do BD and Marketing stuff, hope more and more companies join the MakerDAO ecosystem!
This core unit represents me, you can see the work and effort, keep up the good work.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Highlights of the month      MakerDAO onboards Vivid Money  Vivid Money, a web2.0 payment app, has added both DAI and MKR to their wallet. Vivid Money’s users can now buy DAI and MKR and offramp DAI to fiat. This is great for Dai as Vivid Money has a user base of more than 500K. The Growth CU took this opportunity to educate their users of Dai and Maker by joining them in their podcast, Stocks & the City. We are continuing to explore ways for us to increase awareness in their retail user base. Click here for more information.   Partnership with BlockFI  BlockFi will add MKR for the buy / sell and earn yield program in July. The Growth CU will do a Webinar with them to explain how Maker works to their retail customers. This will provide exposure to Dai to the retail user base of BlockFi.    General updates   As you may know, June was the last month of @Doo_StableLab as part of the Growth team. Thank Doo for your contribution to GrowthCU, and to the growth of Maker in Asia, especially in SK. After the approval of our budget, we are moving forward with the Brand strategy, and to achieve with our objectives, we looked for someone who can help us in this direction. Welcome, @Mamun to the team!   Business development We closed 18 integrations in Q2. Some notable integrations closed in June are with Blockchain.com and Vivid Money. Please see below for details of the other integrations:   Swarm Markets launched the institutional-grade liquid staking and Dai has been made available to provide liquidity across many different pools. - Link   Kriptomat.io is listing DAI in their upcoming KriptoEarn product.  Stellaswap launched Moonbeam-based stable base pool with Dai, enabling staking and trading of Dai. - Link   For more detailed business development updates, click here for the most recent post covering the business development update for the Europe Region.  Marketing and communication  Top 5 tweets of the month    Tweet thread on MIP65: Monetalis Clydesdale: Liquid Bond Strategy & Execution rETH (Rocket Pool staked ETH) added as a new collateral type in the Maker Protocol Overview of the liquidation auctions executed on June 13 Tweet thread explaining the long-term growth strategy for Maker MakerDAO celebrates World Environmental Day by presenting Nature, a POAP collection   Monthly Twitter report Followers: 223.6k (+1.8% MoM) Impressions in June: 1,464.3k (+0.4% MoM) Engagement in June: 36.9k (+4.7% MoM)   Recently published articles and PR releases  Media coverage of Maker voting to invest $500 million in US Treasury Bills - Link  Tweet thread about rETH (Rocket Pool Staked ETH) being added as a new collateral type in the Maker Protocol - Link  Tweet about how Oasis App’s new stop-loss protection can be used to protect Maker Vaults - Link    Marketing activations and speaker sessions  Vivid Money hosted Jocelyn on their podcast, Stocks & the City, to discuss Dai and Maker - Link  Hosted a Twitter Space with Instadapp - Link  Continued marketing of the Nature POAP initiative - Link.  We have planted 118 trees so far    For more detailed marketing and communication updates, please refer to the most recent posts by the Brand and PR teams:  Brand update, May PR update    We want to hear from you    Share your thoughts, feedback or tips with us in the comments below. Please use this link if you prefer engaging with us anonymously.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Growth Monthly Update, September 2022  Highlights of the month     PSM Yield Offering   Since the PSM creation, our community has been thinking about how to optimize Maker’s PCV, and we have been looking for alternatives. We joined forces with SFCU to create a revenue share strategy using Maker’s assets and started conversations with various stablecoin players in the ecosystem. After months of negotiations, we received the Coinbase USDC Institutional rewards proposal (MIP81) and the Gemini Marketing Initiative in September. As we thought, these posts inspired others to present similar proposals in the forum: CoinShares USDC Institutional Rewards (MIP86) and OUSD Decentralized Rewards (MIP87). Although we can’t reveal the names, we have been talking with others and expect new proposals in the following weeks.  Binance Card   Increasing DAI demand is highly related to helping with DAI adoption, which is why we think it is important to maintain a closer relationship with the companies taking the lead on this mission. Over the last years, Binance has developed solutions for people to adopt crypto by reducing the complexity of how we buy, sell, save, invest and spend it, converting themselves into a crypto bank widely used in emergent markets. We are working with Binance to be part of their adoption strategy, and in the following weeks, we will launch a campaign focus on Latam, starting in Argentina, to increase DAI adoption through the Binance Card.  Devcon and Growth’s offsite   The Growth team went to Colombia for Devcon and our offsite. During Devcon, the team spoke with old partners and newer projects interested in doing something with us in helping Maker to increase Dai supply and demand. The offsite was an opportunity to review the last two quarters, align on our strategic objectives and prepare our execution plan for Q4-22 and Q1-23. Here are some highlights from the Growth team about it:  Jenn: Projects like “Defience”, a new crypto payments tool that allows payment to DAO contributors or service providers in any fiat- crypto and vice versa in scheduled batches (ie. pay every week, 2 weeks etc). Or “Debt Dao”, a new protocol that helps facilitate loans to DAOs who use their revenue/treasury as collateral for stablecoin loans, all onchain. A large theme across Devcon was on L2s and particularly ZK rollups. There is interest from different ZK and Optimistic roll-up teams like Scroll and Metis to have the native DAI bridge integrated and of course MCD deployed as an application following on from Optimism, Arbitrum and Starknet. Rajiv: Devcon was all about making connections and forging relationships and bonds - this is true both internally and externally. Within the Growth team, 3 days together at our team offsite allowed us to align on our strategic objectives whilst having a lot of fun ! But also prior to that just the fact of being together gave us the opportunity to collaborate for a Bloomberg article looking to cover the MakerDAO ecosystem. Meeting and collaborating with other teams within the DAO and sharing ideas is also invaluable, The Maker team dinner and DAIvinity event provided opportunity to do just that. These events also give the opportunity to forge stronger bonds with partners and sitting down with the likes of Gnosis and RocketPool teams allowed us to align on go-to-market plans for their upcoming collateral additions, and finally its always great to meet new projects and understand how they are seeing the market. Tobal: Devcon’s biggest opportunity was meeting many contributors and members of the MakerDAO community. It was amazing to be present at the moment when a big community that seems to be always spread all over the world finally comes together to share the same purpose with the same vibe we’ve been feeling, but this time in real life. I want to thank you all for making that moment really special, and, on top of that, for all your contributions during Devcon’s talks and workshops. Luis: at DevCon had the pleasure to finally meet my team and all the other Maker folks. I believe since we spend so much time behind a screen these reunions give you the energy to move forward and continue doing what you like, in my case I’ve been 4 years around Maker and its community and it’s amazing to know that all of them are incredible persons in real life. DevCon gave a huge space for learning and to let the world know that Latam exists and loves crypto. I can’t wait for the next one and see how people will look at Maker with the new paradigm of the MetaDAOs. (btw, huge shout out to Luigi, the mind behind Maker billboards in Bogota during Devcon)    twitter.com    Maker @MakerDAO  El Dorado, Bogotá airport, welcomed all #DevconVI participants by reminding us what we are and why we were there — A decentralized community being reunited to celebrate our achievements and look forward to the future of Ethereum. ✈️ https://t.co/MHUe6xY9KK    5:35 PM - 19 Oct 2022           7              Transparency Dashboard  Check our Notion to find all you want to know about the Growth CU.   General updates   Business development We closed 4 integrations in September. Please see below for details of the integrations:  Argent DAI campaign on zkSync Pyth DAI oracle ODOS DEX aggregator 0Vix DAI integration  For more detailed business development updates, refer to the recent forum posts covering the North America, Europe and APAC regions.  Marketing and communication  Top 5 tweets of the month    Merge risk implications Merge risk implications for Maker oracle Protocol Gemini GUSD Proposal Coinbase CFO Call announcement Pre-Merge comms for Maker users   Recently published articles and PR releases  Pyth Partners with MakerDAO MakerDAO governance votes yes to adding GnosisDAO token as collateral for DAI   Marketing activations and speaker sessions   zkSync DAI campaign on Argent finished with great results, turning in zkSync DAI circulation increased by 4.78%!  Euromoney - DeFi pioneer MakerDAO funds regulated US bank with Greg Di Prisco  Please refer to the most recent forum post by the Brand team for a more detailed marketing and communication update.  We want to hear from you    Share your thoughts, feedback or tips with us in the comments below. Please use this link if you prefer engaging with us anonymously.

MakerGrowth:   Binance Card   Increasing DAI demand is highly related to helping with DAI adoption, which is why we think it is important to maintain a closer relationship with the companies taking the lead on this mission. Over the last years, Binance has developed solutions for people to adopt crypto by reducing the complexity of how we buy, sell, save, invest and spend it, converting themselves into a crypto bank widely used in emergent markets. We are working with Binance to be part of their adoption strategy, and in the following weeks, we will launch a campaign focus on Latam, starting in Argentina , to increase DAI adoption through the Binance Card.   I love this news, now, since Binance is our shield from regional regulations, what are the possibilities of being able to use Binance as an intermediary to allow loans according to international interest rates or a little more. And for these loans to be paid, they must be verified Binance users who have handled “x” amount of BUSD, DAI or USDT over time and the loan will of course be given in DAI and will have to be paid in DAI. The volume of entrepreneurship in LATAM has increased and the number of people requesting loans in dollars is increasing, and nothing better than being a lender to verified users of Binance and that Binance is the custodian of resolving those loans. With this, greater organic volume and greater knowledge of “DAI helps citizens”
